verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, that they <S%H5144>separate<s%> themselves from the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they hallow unto <S%H2490>me<s%>, and that they profane not my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, Whosoever he be of all your <S%H2233>seed<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, that approacheth unto the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6942>hallow<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> upon <S%H5315>him<s%>, that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from before <S%H3068>me<s%>: I am Jehovah.

What man <S%H376>soever<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> is a <S%H6879>leper<s%>, or hath an <S%H2100>issue<s%>; he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, until he be <S%H2891>clean<s%>. And whoso <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> anything that is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by the <S%H5315>dead<s%>, or a <S%H376>man<s%> whose <S%H2233>seed<s%> goeth from <S%H3318>him<s%>;

or <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> any creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%>, whereby he may be made <S%H2930>unclean<s%>, or a <S%H120>man<s%> of whom he may take <S%H2930>uncleanness<s%>, whatsoever uncleanness he <S%H2932>hath<s%>;

the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that toucheth any such shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> until the <S%H6153>even<s%>, and shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, <S%H518>unless<s%> he <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>.
And when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down<s%>, he shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>; and <S%H310>afterward<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, because it is his bread.
That which dieth of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, or is <S%H2966>torn<s%> of <S%H398>beasts<s%>, he shall not eat, to <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself <S%H3068>therewith<s%>: I am Jehovah.

They shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5375>charge<s%>, lest they bear <S%H2399>sin<s%> for <S%H4191>it<s%>, and die <S%H2490>therein<s%>, if they profane <S%H3068>it<s%>: I am Jehovah who sanctifieth <S%H6942>them<s%>.

There shall no <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>: a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> of the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s, or a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%>, shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>.

But if a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> any <S%H5315>soul<s%>, the purchase of his <S%H3701>money<s%>, he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3211>it<s%>; and such as are born in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, they shall eat of his <S%H398>bread<s%>.
And if a <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> be married unto a <S%H376>stranger<s%>, she shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>things<s%>.

But if a <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> be a <S%H490>widow<s%>, or <S%H1644>divorced<s%>, and have no <S%H2233>child<s%>, and be <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, as in her <S%H5271>youth<s%>, she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H2114>bread<s%>: but there shall no stranger eat <S%H398>thereof<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%>, then he shall <S%H3254>put<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof unto <S%H5414>it<s%>, and shall give unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%>.
And they shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they <S%H7311>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

and so cause them to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> that bringeth <S%H819>guilt<s%>, when they <S%H398>eat<s%> their holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who sanctifieth <S%H6942>them<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H376>them<s%>, Whosoever he be of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>sojourners<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, whether it be any of their <S%H5088>vows<s%>, or any of their <S%H5071>freewill-offerings<s%>, which they <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>;
that ye may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%>, ye shall offer a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, of the <S%H1241>bullocks<s%>, of the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>.
But whatsoever hath a <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, that shall ye not <S%H7126>offer<s%>: for it shall not be acceptable for <S%H7522>you<s%>.

And <S%H376>whosoever<s%> <S%H7126>offereth<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H6381>accomplish<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or for a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%>, of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> or of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, it shall be <S%H8549>perfect<s%> to be <S%H7522>accepted<s%>; there shall be no blemish <S%H3971>therein<s%>.

Blind <S%H5788><s%>, or <S%H7665>broken<s%>, or <S%H2782>maimed<s%>, or having a <S%H2990>wen<s%>, or <S%H1618>scurvy<s%>, or <S%H3217>scabbed<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> these unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, nor <S%H5414>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> of them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Either a <S%H7794>bullock<s%> or a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that hath anything <S%H8311>superfluous<s%> or lacking in his <S%H7038>parts<s%>, that mayest thou <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%>; but for a <S%H5088>vow<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted<s%>.

That which hath its stones <S%H4600>bruised<s%>, or <S%H3807>crushed<s%>, or <S%H5423>broken<s%>, or <S%H3772>cut<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; neither shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> thus in your <S%H776>land<s%>.

Neither from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H5236>foreigner<s%> shall ye <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> of any of <S%H4893>these<s%>; because their corruption is in <S%H3971>them<s%>, there is a blemish in <S%H7521>them<s%>: they shall not be accepted for you.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When a <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or a <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, or a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, is brought <S%H3205>forth<s%>, then it shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> under the <S%H517>dam<s%>; and from the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>thenceforth<s%> it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for the oblation of an <S%H7133>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And whether it be <S%H7794>cow<s%> or <S%H7716>ewe<s%>, ye shall not <S%H7819>kill<s%> it and its <S%H1121>young<s%> both in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And when ye <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye shall <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> it that ye may be <S%H7522>accepted<s%>.
On the same <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%>; ye shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> none of it until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>: I am Jehovah.

And ye shall not <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>; but I will be <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> who halloweth <S%H6942>you<s%>,
who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
